name: app/src/main/res/layout/activity_start.xml
content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context="app.infiniverse.grocery.StartActivity"
    tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="25dp">

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/logo"
        android:layout_width="@android:dimen/thumbnail_height"
        android:layout_height="@android:dimen/thumbnail_width"
        android:src="@drawable/icon"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/login"
        app:layout_constraintDimensionRatio="w,1:1"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />


    <Button
        android:id="@+id/login"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
        android:textColor="@color/md_yellow_800"
        android:layout_marginEnd="24dp"
        android:layout_marginStart="24dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
        android:background="@drawable/box"
        android:text="Already a customer? Sign in"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/register"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.61"
        app:layout_constraintVertical_chainStyle="packed" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/register"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="24dp"
        android:layout_marginStart="24dp"
        android:background="@drawable/box"
        android:text="New User? Create an account"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/skip"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/login" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/skip"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="24dp"
        android:layout_marginStart="24dp"
        android:background="@drawable/box"
        android:text="Skip sign in"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/register" />
</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>

result.harmony_component_code:
Column() {
  Image($r('app.media.icon'))
    .width('100%')
    .height('100%')
    .objectFit(ImageFit.Contain)
    .alignRules({
      top: { anchor: '__container__', align: VerticalAlign.Top },
      bottom: { anchor: 'login', align: VerticalAlign.Top },
      left: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
      right: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
    })
  Button('Already a customer? Sign in')
    .id('login')
    .width('100%')
    .height('auto')
    .margin({ bottom: '16vp', end: '24vp', start: '24vp', top: '8vp' })
    .backgroundColor($r('app.color.box'))
    .fontColor($r('app.color.md_yellow_800'))
    .alignRules({
      top: { anchor: '__container__', align: VerticalAlign.Top },
      bottom: { anchor: 'register', align: VerticalAlign.Top },
      left: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
      right: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End },
      verticalBias: 0.61
    })
  Button('New User? Create an account')
    .id('register')
    .width('100%')
    .height('auto')
    .margin({ bottom: '16vp', end: '24vp', start: '24vp' })
    .backgroundColor($r('app.color.box'))
    .alignRules({
      top: { anchor: 'login', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
      bottom: { anchor: 'skip', align: VerticalAlign.Top },
      left: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
      right: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
    })
  Button('Skip sign in')
    .id('skip')
    .width('100%')
    .height('auto')
    .margin({ bottom: '16vp', end: '24vp', start: '24vp' })
    .backgroundColor($r('app.color.box'))
    .alignRules({
      top: { anchor: 'register', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
      bottom: { anchor: '__container__', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
      left: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
      right: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
    })
}

explanation:
1. 使用Column作为根容器，模拟ConstraintLayout的布局方式。
2. Image组件用于显示logo，使用$r('app.media.icon')引用资源，设置宽度和高度为100%以适应父容器，并使用objectFit(ImageFit.Contain)确保图片显示效果。
3. Button组件用于显示登录、注册和跳过按钮，设置id、宽度、高度、边距、背景颜色和字体颜色，并使用alignRules实现约束布局的效果。
4. 所有组件的宽度和高度根据内容自适应，使用'auto'，跟随父组件时使用'100%'。
5. 引用资源时，使用$r('app.xxx.yyy')格式。
6. 对于约束布局，使用alignRules实现组件之间的相对位置关系。
